title: De Barsy Syndrome: Epidemiology and Clinical Presentation
short_description: Clinical overview of De Barsy syndrome, a rare genetic disorder with fewer than 50 reported cases affecting males and females equally.
long_description: This document provides epidemiological information about De Barsy syndrome, a rare genetic disorder that affects both males and females equally. With fewer than 50 cases documented in medical literature, the exact incidence and prevalence remain unknown due to potential misdiagnosis or underdiagnosis. The syndrome typically presents with obvious clinical manifestations at birth or during early infancy, making early recognition important for proper diagnosis and management.
